turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I'd like you to call Fillmore Pizza and order dinner for me to pick up on my way home.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, no problem. What do you want me to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you get a pesto pizza and one with regular tomato sauce?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size pesto pizza do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Large. And can you get it gluten free?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I think they only offer small gluten free pizzas at Fillmore.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, right. Okay, normal largethen.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. Any toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. Actually, hang on... let's add extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind? They've got a bunch of fancy cheeses you can add as toppings.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just regular mozzarella.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Cool. What about the other pizza, the regular tomato sauce one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Also a large for that one, with broccoli and garlic as toppings.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Roasted garlic okay? They don't have any other kind.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's fine. What's the total?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: One large pesto pizza with extra mozzarella cheese, and one large tomato sauce pizza with roasted garlic and broccoli. $31.03, plus tax.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: All right, hang on. Okay, your order is complete and the pizzas will be ready for pickup in about 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I billed it to your normal account. You should get the receipt on your phone as a text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just got it. Thank you so much!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome. Do you need anything else before I go home?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that's it. Good night!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Good night.
